element.name: Legends of Runeterra: Dark Tides of Bilgewater

description.p: Legends of Runeterra: Dark Tides of Bilgewater includes three new subclasses perfect for adventures on ships, under the sea, and on the scummy streets of the Bilge. A new adventure full of brand-new monsters, magic items, and NPCs drawn from the lore of Legends of Runeterra.

setters.set: This content is no longer available on D&D Beyond.
